Package team14.warzone.GameEngine

Class Player

java.lang.Object
team14.warzone.GameEngine.Player
Direct Known Subclasses:
NeutralPlayer
public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
Class implements the player model

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player()
      Default constructor that takes no params

    • Player

      public Player​(java.lang.String d_Name, int d_TotalNumberOfArmies, java.util.ArrayList<Country> d_CountriesOwned, java.util.ArrayList<Order> d_OrderList, GameEngine p_GE)
      Constructor that takes all attributes as params
      Parameters:
      d_Name - name of the player
      d_TotalNumberOfArmies - total number of armies
      d_CountriesOwned - list of countries (Country objects) owned by the player
      d_OrderList - list of orders the player has issued but has not executed yet
      p_GE - game engine

    • Player

      public Player​(java.lang.String p_Name, GameEngine p_GE)
      Constructor that accepts playername and sets the other attributes with default values
      Parameters:
      p_Name - name of the player
      p_GE - gameengine

  • Method Details

    • issueOrder

      public void issueOrder()
      This method adds order to the list of orders

    • nextOrder

      public void nextOrder()
      This method executes the first order in the order list
      • Order list is maintained in a FIFO fasion
      • Check if order list is empty
      • Execute the order that was issued first
      • After execution resize the list

    • addCountryOwned

      public void addCountryOwned​(Country p_Country)
      This method adds a country to the list of countries owned by the player
      Parameters:
      p_Country - country that is to be added

    • removeCountryOwned

      Parameters:
      p_Country - country that is to be removed

    • isDiplomaticPlayer

      public boolean isDiplomaticPlayer​(Player p_CurrentPlayer, Player p_TargetPlayer)
      Checks if the players are in diplomatic relation
      Parameters:
      p_CurrentPlayer - the current player
      p_TargetPlayer - the target player
      Returns:
      true if either of them have used diplomacy card on each other
